plot: Ren Nanase, a nurse at a hospital, wants to do her best. But the way she encounters some patients tempts her and the descending spiral begins. The plot centers around "patient-like files" in which each scene is more depraved than the preceding one, approaching to the maximum perversion.
ending_theme: "Katakoi" (カタコイ; "Unrequited Love") by Hikaru Ikeda
